name: saho
description: A custom Radix subtheme, based on Bootstrap 5.

scripts.lint: npm run biome:check && npm run stylelint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run biome:check && npm run stylelint:fix
scripts.build:prod: npm run production && npm run compress
scripts.compress: find dist -name '*.css' -type f ! -name '*.gz' -exec sh -c 'gzip -k -9 "$1" 2>/dev/null || true' _ {} \; && find dist -name '*.js' -type f ! -name '*.gz' -exec sh -c 'gzip -k -9 "$1" 2>/dev/null || true' _ {} \;
scripts.copy:assets: cp -r src/assets/images dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null; cp -r src/assets/icons dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null; cp -r src/assets/videos dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null; cp -r src/assets/fonts dist/ 2>/dev/null; true
